cli.arg.area.owned.no-containment: There is no suitable Local Region as parent for the marked area (no ownership or containment)
cli.arg.region.add.child.no-valid: There are no valid child regions for region %s.
cli.arg.region.owned.empty: There is no suitable Local Region as parent
cli.arg.region.owned.empty.using-dim: There is no suitable Local Region as parent for %s (no ownership or containment). Using %s as parent.
cli.arg.region.owned.invalid: Supplied region is not owned or suitable as parent for %s
cli.arg.region.owned.invalid.containment: Region %s is not suitable as parent for %s (does not fully contain child region)
cli.arg.region.owned.invalid.permission: Region %s is not suitable as parent for %s (no permission for parent)
cli.flag.msg.text.example.0: PVP ist in der Region {region} deaktiviert!
cli.flag.msg.text.example.2: You can't place blocks here in the region {region}, {player}!
cli.flag.msg.text.example.3: Sorry, you are not allowed to break blocks here, {player}!
cli.flag.msg.text.example.4: Team '{team}' is not allowed to place blocks here!
cli.flag.msg.text.example.5: You are not allowed to use this block ('{block}' @ '{pos}')!
cli.flag.msg.text.example.6: Only players and teams which are '{group}' are allowed to participate in PVP here!
cli.flag.msg.text.example.7: This action is denied here because of the '{flag}' flag!
cli.flag.msg.text.example.8: Entity {entity} at {pos} can't be tamed because of the active flag '{flag}' in the region '{region}'!
cli.flag.msg.text.link.hover.false: Flag override is inactive. This flag will be overridden by the same flag in child regions
cli.flag.msg.text.link.hover.true: Flag override is active. This flag overrides the flag state of child regions for the same flag
cli.flag.msg.text.set.default: Reset flag message for flag '%s' of '%s' to config default
cli.flag.msg.text.set.link.hover: Change the message shown when the flag '%s' of '%s' is triggered
cli.flag.msg.text.set.value: Set flag message for %s of %s to: '%s'
cli.flag.state.allowed.info.hover: A flag with allowed state does not prevent the related action
cli.flag.state.denied.info.hover: A flag with denied state prevents the related action
cli.flag.state.disabled.info.hover: A disabled flag is not considered in flag checks

help.tooltip.stick.marker.simple.1: Wird genutzt um die Fläche für eine neue Region zu markieren.
help.tooltip.stick.marker.simple.2: Der RegionMarker muss während der Erstellung einer neuen Region in der Hand gehalten werden!
